trans-unit.source: Controls deserialization by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller deserialisering av <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>klasse.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: During initialization, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically generates and compiles a temporary class for deserialization that is derived from the abstract XmlSerializationReader class.
trans-unit.target: Under initialisering av .NET Framework XML serialisering dynamisk genererer og kompilerer en midlertidig klasse deserialisering som er avledet av den abstrakte klassen XmlSerializationReader.

trans-unit.source: XmlSerializationReader is also implemented within the .NET Framework for deserialization of XML documents into <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> objects.
trans-unit.target: XmlSerializationReader implementeres også i .NET Framework for deserialisering av XML-dokumenter til <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>og <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>objekter.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>

trans-unit.source: You should not derive classes from XmlSerializationReader.
trans-unit.target: Du bør ikke utledet klasser fra XmlSerializationReader.

trans-unit.source: Instead, call one of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Ringe i stedet en av de <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A>

trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Stores an implementation of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReadCallback"></xref> delegate and its input data for a later invocation.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer implementering av den <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReadCallback"> </xref> representanten og tilhørende inndata for en nyere aktivering.

trans-unit.source: The protected members of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader> are intended for use only by derived classes that are used internally within the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Beskyttede medlemmene av <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>er ment for Bruk bare av avledede klasser som er brukt internt i .NET Framework XML-serialisering infrastrukturen.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>

trans-unit.source: During initialization, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically generates and compiles a temporary class for deserialization that derives from <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>.
trans-unit.target: Under initialisering av .NET Framework XML-serialisering dynamisk genererer og kompilerer en midlertidig klasse deserialisering som er avledet fra <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>

trans-unit.source: During this process, the .NET Framework generates read methods that implement the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReadCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Under denne prosessen genererer .NET Framework skrivebeskyttede metoder som implementerer den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReadCallback>delegere.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReadCallback>

trans-unit.source: It does so for certain mappings between .NET Framework types and XML data types that are serialized through SOAP-encoded XML and are not root elements.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes så for en bestemt samsvar mellom datatyper i .NET Framework og XML-datatyper som er serialisert via SOAP-kodet XML ikke og rotelementer.

trans-unit.source: Next, as necessary, a read method is called during deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Les metoden kalles neste behov, under deserialisering.

trans-unit.source: You should not directly create an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReadCallback> class.
trans-unit.target: Du bør ikke direkte opprette en forekomst av <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReadCallback>klassen.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReadCallback>

trans-unit.target: Navnet på .NET Framework-typen som er som deserialiseres.

trans-unit.target: Navneområdet for .NET Framework-typen som er som deserialiseres.

trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>deserialiseres.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReadCallback"> </xref> delegere.

trans-unit.source: Stores an object that is being deserialized from a SOAP-encoded <xref uid="langword_csharp_multiRef" name="multiRef" href=""></xref> element for later access through the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader.GetTarget*> method.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer et objekt som er som deserialiseres fra SOAP-kodet <xref uid="langword_csharp_multiRef" name="multiRef" href=""> </xref> elementet for senere tilgang til den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader.GetTarget*>metoden.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader.GetTarget*>

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding allows a unique XML element to appear once within a SOAP message as a `multiRef` element identified by an `id` attribute.
trans-unit.target: SOAP-koding tillater et unikt XML-element vises én gang i en SOAP-melding som en `multiRef` elementet som identifiseres av en `id` attributtet.

trans-unit.source: The `id` value can be referenced multiple times by `ref` attributes (or `href` attributes in SOAP 1.1) in substitute elements.
trans-unit.target: Den `id` verdien kan refereres flere ganger av `ref` attributter (eller `href` attributter i SOAP 1.1) i stedet bruke elementer.

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: SOAP-koding er beskrevet i delen 5 av SOAP 1.1-spesifikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_id" name="id" href=""></xref> attribute of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_multiRef" name="multiRef" href=""></xref> element that identifies the element.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref uid="langword_csharp_id" name="id" href=""> </xref> for en <xref uid="langword_csharp_multiRef" name="multiRef" href=""> </xref> element som identifiserer elementet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether XML strings are translated into valid .NET Framework type names.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som bestemmer om XML-strenger oversettes til gyldig typenavn for .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.EncodeName%2A> method writes valid XML from invalid sources.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.EncodeName%2A>metoden skriver gyldig XML fra ugyldig kilder.</xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.EncodeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> class can contain spaces, which are invalid as XML.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>for den <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>klasse kan inneholde mellomrom, som er ugyldige som XML.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.DecodeName%2A> reads the encoded XML and restores it to the original value.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.DecodeName%2A>leser kodet XML og gjenoppretter til den opprinnelige verdien.</xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.DecodeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Read%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> class cannot read such encoded XML.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid den <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Read%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>klassen kan ikke lese eksempel kodet XML.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: In that case, set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter.EscapeName%2A> property to `false` to disable the encoding of the XML.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet angitt av <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter.EscapeName%2A>egenskapen `false` å deaktivere kodingen for XML.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter.EscapeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if XML strings are decoded into valid .NET Framework type names; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis XML-strenger dekodede i gyldig .NET Framework-typenavn; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that a given array, or a copy, is large enough to contain a specified index.
trans-unit.target: Sikrer at en gitt matrise eller en kopi er stort nok til en angitt indeks.

trans-unit.source: The protected members of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader> are intended for use only by derived classes that are used internally within the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Beskyttede medlemmene av <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>er ment for Bruk bare av avledede klasser som er brukt internt i .NET Framework XML-serialisering infrastrukturen.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> that is being checked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Array>som blir kontrollert.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The required index.
trans-unit.target: Obligatorisk indeksen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the array's elements.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>matrisens elementer.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The existing <xref:System.Array>, if it is already large enough; otherwise, a new, larger array that contains the original array's elements.
trans-unit.target: Den eksisterende <xref:System.Array>, hvis den allerede er tilstrekkelig; ellers, en ny, større matrise som inneholder den opprinnelige matrisens elementer.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: Fills in the values of a SOAP-encoded array whose data type maps to a .NET Framework reference type.
trans-unit.target: Fyller ut verdiene i en SOAP-kodet matrise datatypen kobles til en .NET Framework-referansetype.

trans-unit.source: The protected members of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader> are intended for use only by derived classes that are used internally within the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Beskyttede medlemmene av <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>er ment for Bruk bare av avledede klasser som er brukt internt i .NET Framework XML-serialisering infrastrukturen.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>

trans-unit.source: The FixupArrayRefs method implements the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationFixupCallback> delegate for deserialization of SOAP-encoded XML data.
trans-unit.target: Metoden FixupArrayRefs implementerer den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationFixupCallback>delegere for deserialisering av SOAP-kodet XML-data.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationFixupCallback>

trans-unit.source: While deserializing XML documents into .NET Framework objects, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically creates an instance of the FixupArrayRefs method for SOAP-encoded arrays whose data types map to .NET Framework reference types.
trans-unit.target: Under deserialisering av XML-dokumenter i .NET Framework-objekter, .NET Framework XML-serialisering infrastruktur dynamisk oppretter en forekomst av metoden FixupArrayRefs for SOAP-kodet matriser med datatyper tilordnes til .NET Framework referansetyper.

trans-unit.source: The method then is called by <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationFixupCallback> to fill in the objects in the array.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kalles deretter av <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationFixupCallback>å fylle ut objektene i matrisen.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationFixupCallback>

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: SOAP-koding er beskrevet i delen 5 av SOAP 1.1-spesifikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the array whose values are filled in.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder matrise som inneholder verdiene er fylt ut.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the SOAP-encoded array where the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is currently positioned.
trans-unit.target: Henter lengden på SOAP-kodet matrisen der den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>for øyeblikket er plassert.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.target: Metoden GetArrayLength gjelder den `arrayType` attributtet som brukes med SOAP-koding og angitt med navneområdet "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/".

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that is being deserialized from a SOAP-encoded <xref uid="langword_csharp_multiRef" name="multiRef" href=""></xref> element and that was stored earlier by <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader.AddTarget*>.
trans-unit.target: Henter et objekt som er som deserialiseres fra SOAP-kodet <xref uid="langword_csharp_multiRef" name="multiRef" href=""> </xref> element, og som er lagret tidligere <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader.AddTarget*>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader.AddTarget*>

trans-unit.target: Beskyttede medlemmene av <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>er ment for Bruk bare av avledede klasser som er brukt internt i .NET Framework XML-serialisering infrastrukturen.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding allows a unique XML element to appear once within a SOAP message as a `multiRef` element identified by an `id` attribute.
trans-unit.target: SOAP-koding tillater et unikt XML-element vises én gang i en SOAP-melding som en `multiRef` elementet som identifiseres av en `id` attributtet.

trans-unit.source: The `id` value can be referenced multiple times using `href` attributes (or `ref` attributes in SOAP 1.2) in substitute elements.
trans-unit.target: Den `id` verdien kan være refereres til flere ganger med `href` attributter (eller `ref` attributter i SOAP 1.2) i stedet bruke elementer.

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: SOAP-koding er beskrevet i delen 5 av SOAP 1.1-spesifikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_id" name="id" href=""></xref> attribute of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_multiRef" name="multiRef" href=""></xref> element that identifies the element.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref uid="langword_csharp_id" name="id" href=""> </xref> for en <xref uid="langword_csharp_multiRef" name="multiRef" href=""> </xref> element som identifiserer elementet.

trans-unit.source: An object to be deserialized from a SOAP-encoded <xref uid="langword_csharp_multiRef" name="multiRef" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt deserialisert fra SOAP-kodet <xref uid="langword_csharp_multiRef" name="multiRef" href=""> </xref> elementet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_xsi:type" name="xsi:type" href=""></xref> attribute for the XML element at the current location of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien for den <xref uid="langword_csharp_xsi:type" name="xsi:type" href=""> </xref> attributt for XML-elementet ved gjeldende plassering for <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The `type` attribute from the instance of the XML Schema namespace explicitly specifies the data type of an XML element.
trans-unit.target: Den `type` attributtet fra forekomsten av XML-skjema-navneområdet eksplisitt angir datatypen for en XML-elementet.

trans-unit.source: An XML qualified name that indicates the data type of an XML element.
trans-unit.target: Et XML-kvalifisert navn som angir datatypen for en XML-elementet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes callback methods that populate objects that map to SOAP-encoded XML data.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer tilbakeringing metoder som fylle objekter som er tilordnet SOAP-kodet XML-data.

trans-unit.source: The protected members of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader> are intended for use only by derived classes that are used internally within the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Beskyttede medlemmene av <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>er ment for Bruk bare av avledede klasser som er brukt internt i .NET Framework XML-serialisering infrastrukturen.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>

trans-unit.source: During initialization, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically generates and compiles a temporary class for deserialization that is derived from <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>.
trans-unit.target: Under initialisering av .NET Framework XML-serialisering dynamisk genererer og kompilerer en midlertidig klasse deserialisering som er avledet fra <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>

trans-unit.source: During this process, the .NET Framework generates read methods that implement the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReadCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Under denne prosessen genererer .NET Framework skrivebeskyttede metoder som implementerer den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReadCallback>delegere.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReadCallback>

trans-unit.source: It does so for certain mappings between .NET Framework types and XML data types that are serialized through SOAP-encoded XML and are not root elements.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes så for en bestemt samsvar mellom datatyper i .NET Framework og XML-datatyper som er serialisert via SOAP-kodet XML ikke og rotelementer.

trans-unit.source: Next, as necessary, a read method is called during deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Les metoden kalles neste behov, under deserialisering.

trans-unit.source: The abstract InitCallbacks method is where the temporary derived class creates an instance of and initializes read callback methods.
trans-unit.target: Abstrakt InitCallbacks metoden leses der den midlertidige utledede klassen oppretter en forekomst av og initialiserer tilbakeringing-metoder.

trans-unit.source: You should not directly create an instance of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReadCallback>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke opprette en forekomst av <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReadCallback>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReadCallback> direkte

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: SOAP-koding er beskrevet i delen 5 av SOAP 1.1-spesifikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader> uses an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> class to count when a read operation occurs.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>bruker en forekomst av den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>klassen for å telle når det oppstår en leseoperasjon.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>

trans-unit.source: The count is incremented each time the reader calls an appropriate method, for example the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A> method or the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadElementString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Antallet økes hver gang leseren kaller en egnet metode, for eksempel den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>metoden eller <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadElementString%2A>metode.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadElementString%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding allows a unique XML element to appear once within a SOAP message as a `multiRef` element identified by an `id` attribute.
trans-unit.target: SOAP-koding tillater et unikt XML-element vises én gang i en SOAP-melding som en `multiRef` elementet som identifiseres av en `id` attributtet.

trans-unit.source: The `id` value can be referenced multiple times using `href` attributes (or `ref` attributes in SOAP 1.2) in substitute elements.
trans-unit.target: Den `id` verdien kan være refereres til flere ganger med `href` attributter (eller `ref` attributter i SOAP 1.2) i stedet bruke elementer.

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: SOAP-koding er beskrevet i delen 5 av SOAP 1.1-spesifikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The protected members of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader> are intended for use only by derived classes that are used internally within the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Beskyttede medlemmene av <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>er ment for Bruk bare av avledede klasser som er brukt internt i .NET Framework XML-serialisering infrastrukturen.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding, as specified in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification, allows for elements referenced multiple times in a SOAP message (or optionally, just once) to be referred by an `href` attribute in the main message.
trans-unit.target: SOAP-koding, som er angitt i delen 5 av SOAP 1.1-spesifikasjonen gjør det mulig for elementer som refereres flere ganger i en SOAP-melding (eller eventuelt bare én gang) referert av en `href` attributt i den primære meldingen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject> event occurs when such an element appears, but there is no `href` reference to it.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject>hendelsen oppstår når slikt element vises, men det finnes ingen `href` referanse til den.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject>

trans-unit.source: Add a handler method to <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject> to provide custom handling for unreferenced objects while the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> executes its <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Legg til et behandlingsprogram metoden <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject>oppgi egendefinert handling for urefererte objekter under den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>utfører den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject>

trans-unit.source: A unique string that is used to identify the unreferenced object, subsequently accessible through the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.UnreferencedObjectEventArgs.UnreferencedId*> property.
trans-unit.target: En unik streng som brukes til å identifisere det urefererte-objektet senere tilgjengelig gjennom den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.UnreferencedObjectEventArgs.UnreferencedId*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.UnreferencedObjectEventArgs.UnreferencedId*>

trans-unit.source: An object that the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> is attempting to deserialize, subsequently accessible through the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.UnreferencedObjectEventArgs.UnreferencedObject*> property.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>prøver å deserialisere senere tilgjengelig gjennom den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.UnreferencedObjectEventArgs.UnreferencedObject*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.UnreferencedObjectEventArgs.UnreferencedObject*> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>
